Neonatal Seizures. May increase dosage as needed by 10 mg/kg/day over 3 days to a usal MAXIMUM dose of 30 mg/kg/day. Additional increases up to 45 to 60 mg/kg/day have been used with persistent seizure activity or clinical EEG findings.
